title: Cabrillo National Monument: Volunteers in Action
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Volunteer     Volunteers in Action              Volunteers in Action                    Volunteers in Action at CNM   7 Photos  This gallery shows Volunteers in Park (VIPs) around Cabrillo performing various functions such as Living History, Tidepool Educators, assisting the public and helping out where ever it is needed.                    Â   VIP Bernie, wows over 100 CNM visitors during the partial solar eclipse!A VIP is always prepared to enhance/broaden a visitors view of CNM. On Thursday, Oct 23, visitors we were treated to a seldom seen viewing experience of the sun and moon.  VIP Bernie shared the use of his 3x5 UV solar viewer, purchased previously from the Visitors Center.  Over 100 people witnessed the partial eclipse and were awed by the opportunity.Who would of guessed that a paper prop and the initiative of a volunteer could have an impact on so many in a short 30 minute timeframe.    Bernie Thank you, for sharing!
